channel.title: 32C3 Congress meetup?
channel.description:
Anyone interested in setting up/joining an Axoloti assembly at [32C3]( https://events.ccc.de/congress/2015/wiki/Main_Page) in Hamburg, December 27th to 30th?
> The 32nd Chaos Communication Congress (32C3) is an annual four-day conference on technology, society and utopia. > The Congress offers lectures and workshops and various events on a multitude of topics including (but not limited to) information technology and generally a critical-creative attitude towards technology and the discussion about the effects of technological advances on society.

item.title: 32C3 Congress meetup?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

I'm at 32C3, in the hardware hacking area, almost next to Mitch' soldering/arduino workshop.

Read full topic

Sold out already!

so, I probably wont be there. See you in Berlin in March perhaps

item.title: 32C3 Congress meetup?
item.dc:creator: @dreamer
item.description:
@dreamer wrote:

Sorry they are not on the forum (yet?), but I did tell them about your plan to meet up already

I linked the assembly-page to the IRC where they are also hanging out.

Enjoy the congres!

item.title: 32C3 Congress meetup?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

dreamer:

I'm not going this year

pity

dreamer:

some other friends with Axoloti's are!

please tag them or invite them to join the assembly!

Read full topic

item.title: 32C3 Congress meetup?
item.dc:creator: @dreamer
item.description:
@dreamer wrote:

Haha, unfortunately I'm not going this year, but some other friends with Axoloti's are!

Actually what I've been doing for mobile use is have the axoloti act as mixer for 2 inputs. So not all is lost if you want to hook up more instruments without a dedicated mixer

Read full topic

item.title: 32C3 Congress meetup?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

I don't have a mixer small enough for traveling, I can bring pc-style speakers, and a few small usb-midi controllers.

I registered an assembly at 32C3 https://events.ccc.de/congress/2015/wiki/Assembly:Axoloti
Please register to the assembly if you want to participate!

And tagging some people: @ooooo @dreamer

Read full topic

item.title: 32C3 Congress meetup?
item.dc:creator: @rvense
item.description:
@rvense wrote:

Good idea. Can bring some things... Shruthis and my MIDIBox seq, maybe. Can anybody organise a mixer and some speakers maybe?

Read full topic

item.title: 32C3 Congress meetup?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

alex:

Are you doing some presentation there again?

No, I did not even submit a proposal for an official presentation.

More thinking like organizing a table in the hardware hacking area, and doing demos, tutorials, coding, and jamming...

Read full topic

item.title: 32C3 Congress meetup?
item.dc:creator: @alex alex
item.description:
@alex wrote:

Perhaps I'll be there for a day or 2. not sure yet, but i'm in Hamburg anyway the 27th, so perhaps I can visit 32c3.
Are you doing some presentation there again?

Read full topic

The 32nd Chaos Communication Congress (32C3) is an annual four-day conference on technology, society and utopia.
